result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. DUSTIN T KONO

records.addlTxt:
2:46 PM Defendant DUSTIN T KONO in court.  Attorney Blake Duren appeared by video for DUSTIN T KONO.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Duren states the defendant will waive the preliminary hearing. Defendant concurs. Court instructs the defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary examination. Defendant waives his/her right to a preliminary examination. Court finds probable cause. Court accepts the waiver of the prelim and binds the defendant over for trial. 

State files an information with the court, same as the criminal complaint and copy to Atty Duren. Attorney Duren acknowledges receipt of the information and waives any reading. Atty Duren stands mute. Court enters a plea of Not Guilty on behalf of the defendant. Court will set for Return Date on February 7, 2023 at 10:00 AM.

Court adjourned at 2:48 PM
Return date scheduled for February 7, 2023 at 10:00 am.
Return date on February 7, 2023 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver on October 25, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

records.addlTxt: Letter to the defendant dated 08/18/2022 re: Court appoints Atty Blake Duren. The issue of repayment will be addressed upon the conclusion of this case.
Order on Petition for Appointment of an Attorney (Atty Blake Duren)

10:40 AM Defendant DUSTIN T KONO not in court.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Court notes that the defendant filed the request for court appointed counsel and stated that if it was filed prior to the hearing, the defendant dids not need to appear. Court will review the form.

Court adjourned at 10:41 AM.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

9:09 AM Defendant DUSTIN T KONO in court.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. Court instructs defendant of his/her right to an attorney.  Defendant wishes to proceed without an attorney today. ADA McElroy makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500 signature bond and conditions of: Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the time limits. Court will set for status hearing May 31, 2022 at 10:00 AM.

Court adjourned at 9:11 AM.
